bibl.note: PASCHIDIS Paschalis, Between City and King. Prosopographical Studies on the Intermediaries between the Cities of the Greek Mainland and the Aegean and the Royal Courts in the Hellenistic Period (322-190 BC). (Μελετήματα. 59.)
Athens, Κέντρον Ἑλληνικῆς καὶ Ρωμαϊκῆς Ἀρχαιότητος τοῦ Ἐθνικοῦ Ἱδρύματος Ἐρευνῶν (Diffusion: de Boccard, Paris), 2008, 8°, 611 pp. ISBN 978-960-7905-44-4. €64.
